backend/main.mo: Defines core types, state maps, and comparison helpers for restaurants, orders, reviews, and users, integrating authorization and user-approval logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level routing and auth requirements to the specific frontend files and components implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend pages, components, and utilities for routing, reviews, admin tools, hooks, and UI logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining Foodstreet’s OKLCH color system and dark‑mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, metadata, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines full application routing with role‑gated routes and logic for profile resolution, intended-route handling, and navigation flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with optional login button when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Profile setup modal allowing users to enter basic info and select roles, preventing unauthorized self‑assignment of admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards routes by checking authentication, role permissions, and delivery partner approval before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewCo: Allows users to rate and submit a review for an order unless they already reviewed it.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewLi: Displays restaurant reviews with average rating and a scrollable list of recent entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and loads persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, restaurants, orders, and reviews using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with authentication handling and role-based navigation links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays the admin dashboard with navigation tiles for managing restaurants, orders, users, and delivery partners.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDeliveryPa: Shows pending delivery partner requests and allows admins to approve them.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Fetches and filters all orders for admins, providing status and restaurant filters with detailed order display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRestaurant: Lists restaurants grouped by status and lets admins approve, suspend, or unsuspend them.
Displays all users with role badges and profile details for admin review.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, loads menu details, calculates totals, and allows item removal or proceeding to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Handles checkout flow with address editing, order summary, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerHome: Shows homepage with search and a list of popular restaurants retrieved from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderConfirm: Displays a confirmation message and summary for a successfully placed order.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Shows detailed order status, delivery partner info, and summary with auto-refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists the user's past orders, sorted by date, and links to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/RestaurantDe: Displays restaurant details, menu items grouped by veg/non-veg, reviews, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/customer/SearchResult: Shows restaurant search results with filters and sorting, falling back to all restaurants if no query is provided.
frontend/src/pages/delivery/DeliveryDash: Provides delivery workers with available and active deliveries, enabling acceptance and status updates.
frontend/src/pages/owner/IncomingOrdersP: Lists incoming restaurant orders sorted by time and allows owners to update each order’s status.
frontend/src/pages/owner/MenuManagerPage: Allows restaurant owners to add, edit, and delete menu items with a simple form interface.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerDashboardP: Displays the owner's restaurants, loading and empty states, and links to manage settings, menu, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/owner/RestaurantOnboa: Provides a form for owners to create a new restaurant profile and submit it for review.
frontend/src/pages/owner/RestaurantSetti: Loads a restaurant by ID, allows editing its details unless in restricted status, and submits updates.
frontend/src/utils/authRouting.ts: Defines role-based landing routes and checks if a path is allowed for each app role.
frontend/src/utils/intendedRoute.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the user's intended redirect route using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and modifying hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, components, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state for the Foodstreet app, including role-based features, login routing requirements, and known login redirect bug. Lists implemented features, architectural notes, and marks the file as a fix request.
